issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h3. To use Appcelerator Studio we have login to appcelerator account. That fine. But why 101 times.... every now and then. In 1 hour usage, it will ask to login alteast 30 times. 
Please this is very very  much annoying and that too auth code which comes to email takes about 5-6 minutes and we have wait till it come even to login.

Please alter this feature. Its a humble request

comments.body: Hello, Try out a password change in the platform and re-login in the studio. Thanks.
